comments.body: A little surprising to find this here given `BrokerServer` owns the rest of the lifecycle for these managers. Not sure if it would be any better with a callback to `BrokerServer`?

I was thinking about that too. If I can find a way to condense the initialization into a single startup callback, I'll try to put the code back into `BrokerServer`. It still needs to happen in the context of the metadata listener thread, though.
